detaileddescription.para: An enum constant representing the menu type - horizontal
An enum constant representing the menu type - vertical
An enum constant representing the menu type - grid
An enum constant representing the menu type - half circle for power selection
An enum constant representing the menu - same as power, but used to differ the menu operations
Defines the enum for what type of menu it is
Allocate memor for menu system, gMenus is the menu list.

parameterdescription.para: If non-null, the object menu was parsed to.

simplesect.para: 0 if loads correctly, -1 if it doesn't.

detaileddescription.para: Searches for the first menu from game state in gMenus.

simplesect.para: null if it fails, else the found menu from game state.

detaileddescription.para: Searches for the first free menu slot in gMenus, used for loading new menus.

simplesect.para: null if it fails, else the found free menu.

detaileddescription.para: Searches for the first menu item, with gPlayerName of str given.

simplesect.para: null if it fails, else the found menu item.
